com.tinfoil.sms.settings

Class RemoveContactsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.tinfoil.sms.settings.RemoveContactsActivity

  • public class RemoveContactsActivity
extends Activity
    RemoveContactActivity is an activity that allows for contacts to be deleted from tinfoil-sms's database. ***Please note that contacts will not be deleted from the native database.
